short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A QR code extension that enables you create QR codes for free for any text or URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JKQR is a chrome based web extension that you can use to create QR codes for your links/URLs or even simple texts.
This Productive extension opens up and comes handy for every QR code to be created within seconds.
